SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Client

Interface ClientInterface

All Superinterfaces:
ConfigurableClient, GameManagementInterface, NetworkManagementInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientRMI, ClientTCP
public interface ClientInterface extends ConfigurableClient, NetworkManagementInterface, GameManagementInterface
This empty interface represents a generic client that is configurable (extends ConfigurableClient), can interact using the network (extends NetworkManagementInterface) and can be used to play a game (extends GameManagementInterface).
